extensionAttribute.description: This attribute displays the last user to log in. This attribute applies to both Mac and Windows.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh lastUser=`/usr/bin/last -1 -t console | awk '{print $1}'` if [ $lastUser == "wtmp" ]; then echo "<result>No logins</result>" else echo "<result>$lastUser</result>" fi
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsWindows: On Error Resume Next Dim objComputers Dim strComputers Set objComputers= GetObject("winmgmts:").Instancesof("Win32_ComputerSystem") For each Computer in objComputers strComputers = Computer.UserName Next WScript.Echo "<result>" & strComputers & "</result>"
